snippet.title: Meander Land Trailer [2024]
snippet.description:
Remastered in 4-ish colors! When the notorious cartographer Corylus Flint crash-lands on a desert island ruled by mobster goons, it's up to you to help him escape back into the sky!

This handheld-inspired adventure will be released on Itch.io and SFGHQ on September 6, just in time for SAGE 2024! The steam version will come out just a little later.
